synopsis.text: Despite a career-threatening shoulder injury and the loss of his wife, Joutarou Aragaki, a former national gymnastics champion, refuses to give up on his passion. His coach, Amakusa, advises him to retire, but Joutarou's love for gymnastics and his desire to make his daughter, Rei, proud, drive him to continue. His life takes an unexpected turn when he encounters a mysterious ninja and an unusual chiropractor who help him rediscover his potential. As the competition heats up with the rising star, Tetsuo Minamino, Joutarou is determined to prove to the world that he still has what it takes to be a champion. Set in 2002, this anime follows Joutarou's journey to reclaim his former glory and show the world that age is just a number.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
